Class EnquiryController

java.lang.Object
controller.EnquiryController
public class EnquiryController extends Object
Controller for managing enquiries about BTO projects.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    EnquiryController(EnquiryDB enquiryDB, ProjectDB projectDB, UserDB userDB)
    Constructs a new EnquiryController with references to all necessary databases.

  • Constructor Details

    • EnquiryController

      public EnquiryController(EnquiryDB enquiryDB, ProjectDB projectDB, UserDB userDB)
      Constructs a new EnquiryController with references to all necessary databases.
      Parameters:
      enquiryDB - The enquiry database
      projectDB - The project database
      userDB - The user database

  • Method Details

    • createEnquiry

      public String createEnquiry(String applicantNric, String projectName, String enquiryText)
      Creates a new enquiry about a project.
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - The NRIC of the applicant
      projectName - The name of the project
      enquiryText - The text of the enquiry
      Returns:
      The enquiry ID if successful, null otherwise

    • getEnquiry

      public Enquiry getEnquiry(String enquiryId)
      Gets an enquiry by ID.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry
      Returns:
      The enquiry, or null if not found

    • getEnquiriesByApplicant

      public List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByApplicant(String applicantNric)
      Gets all enquiries for a specific applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - The NRIC of the applicant
      Returns:
      A list of enquiries from the applicant

    • getEnquiriesByProject

      public List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByProject(String projectName)
      Gets all enquiries for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      Returns:
      A list of enquiries about the project

    • getEnquiriesByAnswered

      public List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByAnswered(boolean answered)
      Gets all answered or unanswered enquiries.
      Parameters:
      answered - Whether to filter for answered enquiries
      Returns:
      A list of answered or unanswered enquiries

    • getAllEnquiries

      public List<Enquiry> getAllEnquiries()
      Gets all enquiries in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all enquiries

    • updateEnquiry

      public boolean updateEnquiry(String enquiryId, String enquiryText)
      Updates the text of an existing enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry
      enquiryText - The new text for the enquiry
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • deleteEnquiry

      public boolean deleteEnquiry(String enquiryId)
      Deletes an enquiry from the system.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to delete
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • answerEnquiry

      public boolean answerEnquiry(String enquiryId, String userNric, String responseText)
      Answers an enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry
      userNric - The NRIC of the user providing the answer
      responseText - The text of the response
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise
